title: Thy Kingdom Come: Piercing the Sacred Veil
description: There's no more wondering if Heaven and hell are real.Archangels "Be careful for what you cannot see."THY KINGDOM Piercing the Sacred Veil tells the true story of a ghost researcher working with voice recordings of the dead ~ until the day surreal voices became those of God's Archangels.                                                     *     *     *     *     *For your own experience of Absolute Miracle  come hear the Angels yourselves. Watch the book trailer video found on my Author's Page, linked by clicking my name under the book's title. And for more audio recordings, watch more videos on my blog ThisIsMyMiracle.blogspot.com
author: Mia DiDio
